results.title: Amlodipine in the current management of hypertension
results.text_hl: Side effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ include @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@palpitations@@@, @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@, and @DISEASE_Flushing @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@, which are more common with the higher dose of 10 mg.

results.title: Comparison of the effects of calcium channel blockers plus iron chelation therapy versus chelation therapy only on iron overload in children and young adults with transfusion-dependent thalassemia: A randomized double-blind placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Myocardial @CHEMICAL_Iron @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007501 @@@iron@@@ concentration (MIC) using T2* magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), liver @CHEMICAL_Iron @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007501 @@@iron@@@ concentration (LIC), left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF), and serum ferritin were measured at baseline and 12 months. RESULTS: In the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ group, mean @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac@@@ T2* value significantly increased from 18.11 +- 8.47 to 22.15 +- 7.61 (p = .002) at 12 months, whereas in control group, there was a nonsignificant increase (p = .62) in @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac@@@ T2* value from 19.50 +- 8.84 to 20.03 +- 9.07.

citations.NLM: Gupta V, Kumar I, Raj V, Aggarwal P, Agrawal V. Comparison of the effects of calcium channel blockers plus iron chelation therapy versus chelation therapy only on iron overload in children and young adults with transfusion-dependent thalassemia: A randomized double-blind placebo-controlled trial. Pediatr Blood Cancer. 2022 Jun;69(6):e29564. PMID: 35092347
citations.BibTeX: @article{35092347, title={Comparison of the effects of calcium channel blockers plus iron chelation therapy versus chelation therapy only on iron overload in children and young adults with transfusion-dependent thalassemia: A randomized double-blind placebo-controlled trial.}, author={Gupta V and Kumar I and Raj V and Aggarwal P and Agrawal V}, journal={Pediatr Blood Cancer}, volume={69}, number={6}, pages={e29564}}

results.title: Selected Antihypertensive Agents and Their Fixed-Dose Combinations Effectively Ameliorate Trastuzumab-Mediated Cardiac Dysfunction In Rats.
results.text_hl: This study evaluates the therapeutic potentials of selected antihypertensive drugs [@CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and their fixed-dose combinations (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@) and (@CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@)] in ameliorating @CHEMICAL_Trastuzumab @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068878 @@@trastuzumab@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Trastuzumab @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068878 @@@TZM@@@)-induced @<m>DISEASE_Heart_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac dysfunctions@@@ in experimental @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Adeneye AA, Olorundare OE, Omobowale TO, Akinsola AO, Kolo PM, Albrecht RMA, Crooks PA. Selected Antihypertensive Agents and Their Fixed-Dose Combinations Effectively Ameliorate Trastuzumab-Mediated Cardiac Dysfunction In Rats. Niger J Physiol Sci. 2021 Jun 30;36(1):57-65. PMID: 34987247
